title: What are paper clips used for, and what are some examples? - Quora

response.answer_text: I lost the correct thingy and used a paper clip to open the slot and change my cell phone sim card today because I changed service providers. I happened to find an old fashioned metal paper clip because the coated plastic ones didn’t work. Serendipity. Laziness prevents further thought of all the other times they were worth something.

There are several things you can do and there are several ways in which a paper clip can help you. Creatively thinking, I would collect the paper clips for my future projects where I can use them while creating embellishments, tuck in important pictures and letters together etc. Some of creative and interesting uses are here:  I hope this helps :)
